author: leosimons
msg: Replace testrunner.py with pylid as our testrunner of choice within the main gump script.
* gump: simplify the 'test' option by just leaving it all up to pylid, getting rid of the need for testrunner.

author: leosimons
msg: Fix yp pylid a little bit for our usage.
* bin/pylid-0.3: get rid of all precompiled python files.
* bin/pylid-0.3/pylid.py: modify the code a little so it supports multiple baseDirs, which gump has.
